text: The Girl of Gold is a 1925 silent film melodrama directed by John Ince and starring Florence Vidor. It was released by Producers Distributing Corporation.The Girl of Gold at silentera.comThe AFI Catalog of Feature Films 1893-1993:The Girl of Gold A surviving film preserved in a private collection.The Library of Congress/FIAF American Silent Feature Film Survival Catalog:The Girl of Gold ==Cast== *Florence Vidor - Helen Merrimore *Malcolm McGregor - Schuyler Livingstone *Alan Roscoe - Ned Loring *Bessie Eyton - Ada Tremaine *Claire Du Brey - Edith Loring *Charles K. title: The Girl of Gold
